meanings.definition: A group of compounds that are part of the vitamin B6 group.
meanings.sent1: Pyridoxines are important for our body's health.
meanings.sent2: I take pyridoxines as part of my daily vitamin regimen.
meanings.sent3: Why did the grapefruit refuse to take its pyridoxines? It didn't want to be a 'bitter' pill to swallow!
meanings.sent4: Her energy soared after including pyridoxines in her diet, like adding fuel to a fire.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained that pyridoxines help in converting food into energy, like little workers in a factory.

meanings.definition: A type of vitamin essential for human health.
meanings.sent1: Pyridoxines are crucial for maintaining a healthy nervous system.
meanings.sent2: Many foods contain pyridoxines, such as bananas and chickpeas.
meanings.sent3: Why did the comedian take extra pyridoxines? To ensure his jokes had 'vitamin B' for laughter!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the sun after starting to take pyridoxines regularly.
meanings.sent5: The athlete felt like a superhero with pyridoxines fueling his muscles, ready to conquer any challenge.
